turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order a coffee from the Naperville Peet's on East Ogden Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order from peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Golden Caffè Latte, medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want whole milk or any of their other milk choices?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have skimmed milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: currently, the options for milk at peet's are Non-fat, 2%, Whole, Soy, and Almond.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with nonfat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, no. That should do it for me, I think.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, your order will consist of a medium hot golden cafe latte with nonfat milk from peet's on east augden avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order will cost $4.50. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink has been ordered and it'll be ready in 4 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you can find your receipt on your mobile device.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That should do it for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great!
